name: Ext_R4_MedicationAdministration_context
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicationAdministration.context for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.context from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Encounter or Episode of Care administered as part of
element.definition: The visit, admission, or other contact between patient and health care provider during which the medication administration was performed.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.context` maps to R5 `MedicationAdministration.encounter`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
